name: All Is Not Lost
description:
CONTROLS: 

Gamepad (recommended)

Left Stick (Move), A (Jump), X (Interact/attack), B (Roll)

Keyboard

WADS (Move), Space (Jump), E/Mouse (Interact/Attack), Left Shift (Roll)

In a peaceful village, nestled in the heart of a lush forest, a joyous celebration is underway. The villagers have gathered to witness a wedding between two of their own, surrounded by the warmth and love of family and friends. A young man, a beloved member of the village, is there to share in the joyous occasion.

But as the night draws on, the festivities are interrupted by a dark and sinister force. Demons have descended upon the village, slaughtering everyone in their path. Amidst the chaos and destruction, the young man fights valiantly, but ultimately falls to the overwhelming power of the demons.

As the main character takes his last breath, time suddenly rewinds to the moment just before the demons arrived. Confused and disoriented, he realizes that he has been given another chance to save his people. But with each rebirth, he discovers that he is not alone. The ghost of his previous life appears to him, fighting alongside him and guiding him on his quest to defeat the demons and save the village.

With each new life, the main character grows stronger and more skilled, but the demons also become more powerful and cunning. Will the main character be able to break the cycle of death and destruction, and finally put an end to the demon's reign of terror? Only time will tell in this epic tale of loss, redemption, and the power of the human spirit.
